articles.title: Amazon Faces Record $2.5B Fine Over Prime Subscription Practices
articles.summary: E-commerce giant **Amazon** has agreed to pay a historic **$2.5 billion** settlement to the **Federal Trade Commission** over allegations of deceptive Prime subscription practices. The company was accused of misleading customers during sign-up processes and creating obstacles for cancellations.

articles.title: EU Chief Suggests NATO Could Shoot Down Russian Aircraft
articles.summary: **European Commission** President **Ursula von der Leyen** has controversially stated that shooting down **Russian** aircraft violating **NATO** airspace is a possible option. The statement follows similar remarks by **U.S. President Trump** regarding alliance defense protocols.

articles.title: China Announces Historic Commitment to Reduce Greenhouse Gas Emissions
articles.summary: **President Xi Jinping** has announced **China's** first absolute emissions reduction target, pledging to cut greenhouse gases by **7-10%** by **2035**. The world's largest carbon emitter's commitment marks a significant shift in global climate action.

articles.title: Breakthrough Gene Therapy Shows Promise for Huntington's Disease Treatment
articles.summary: A groundbreaking gene therapy developed by **uniQure** has demonstrated effectiveness in slowing **Huntington's disease** progression during **Phase 1/2** trials. The company plans to submit findings to the **FDA** for review in early 2026.

articles.title: Patriots Owner Sells Minority Stake in Historic NFL Deal
articles.summary: **Robert Kraft** has agreed to sell an **8%** stake in the **New England Patriots**, valuing the franchise at **$9 billion**. The deal marks a significant return on Kraft's original **$172 million** investment from 1994.

articles.title: Violence Erupts in Ladakh as Protesters Demand Statehood Rights
articles.summary: Authorities imposed curfew in **Leh** following violent protests that left **four dead** and **80 injured**. The **Leh Apex Body's** demonstration for statehood and **Sixth Schedule** implementation escalated into widespread clashes.

articles.title: Meta's Threads Overtakes X in Global Daily Users
articles.summary: **Meta's** social platform **Threads** has surpassed **Elon Musk's** **X** in daily active mobile users worldwide. The milestone comes two years after Threads launched as an alternative to the platform formerly known as Twitter.

articles.title: Poll Reveals Deep Concerns Over American Political Stability
articles.summary: A new survey shows **80%** of American voters believe the nation faces a political crisis, with over half worried about escalating violence. The poll follows recent political tensions and the assassination of **MAGA** commentator **Charlie Kirk**.

articles.title: Co-op Reports Massive Losses Following Major Cyber Attack
articles.summary: British retailer **Co-op** has reported **¬£80 million** in losses following a devastating cyber-attack that disrupted operations and left store shelves empty. The company acknowledged significant vulnerabilities in its food business infrastructure.

articles.title: Trump Administration Reaches Agreement to Keep TikTok Operating
articles.summary: Former President **Donald Trump** is expected to approve a deal allowing **TikTok** to continue operations in the **United States**. The agreement involves **Oracle** and addresses long-standing national security concerns about the platform.

dailyGreeting: Good morning! Historic climate and medical breakthroughs ahead.

historicalEvents.description: Spanish explorer Balboa first European to see Pacific Ocean
US Congress adopts Bill of Rights
US Congress establishes Sequoia National Park
Central High School in Arkansas integrated despite protests
